articles.title: Apple Announces Record Q4 Revenue Driven by iPhone Sales
articles.summary: Apple Inc. reported quarterly revenue of $89.5 billion, beating analyst expectations with strong iPhone 15 sales in emerging markets.

claims.text: Apple reported quarterly revenue of $89.5 billion

articles.explanation: Article claims verified against official Apple investor relations data and market analyst consensus. Revenue figures match SEC filings.

articles.title: Tesla Cybertruck Production Ramps Up to 1,000 Units Per Week
articles.summary: Tesla has successfully scaled Cybertruck production at its Texas Gigafactory, reaching a milestone of 1,000 units per week.

claims.text: Cybertruck production reached 1,000 units per week

articles.explanation: Production numbers not officially confirmed by Tesla. Estimate based on delivery tracker data and supplier reports. Moderate confidence.

articles.title: Apple Faces EU Antitrust Investigation Over App Store Policies
articles.summary: European Commission launches formal investigation into Apple's App Store practices, potentially leading to billions in fines.
articles.explanation: Investigation confirmed by official EU Commission press release. Potential fine amounts are speculative.

forecasts.reasoning: Strong revenue beat indicates continued demand. Emerging market growth suggests sustainable momentum. Expect 3-5% upside in near term.
Production ramp-up positive but unverified. If confirmed, could drive 5-8% upside. Monitor for official Tesla announcement.
EU investigation creates regulatory overhang. Historical precedent suggests 2-4% downside pressure until resolution. Long-term fundamentals remain strong.
